name: Hirintror
behaviour: Hirintor retargets very often, but other than that behave like regular [[Ice Golem]]s. Damaging him makes him say "snirr!" and triggers his AoE mana drain attack.
location: First floor of the [[Nibelor Ice Cave]], around {{Mapper Coords|126.110|121.80|8|4|text=here}} and in the [[Formorgar Mines]], around {{Mapper Coords|125.145|122.26|10|2|text=here}}.
strategy: He heals back to full once when you have almost depleted his hit points.
